text: Never. Do. Curbside. Or anything here actually.  They don’t have anyone at the register let alone someone to come give you your order. You stand there for ten minutes waiting for someone to pass by and basically be unable to not help you. …More

text: My experiance was very disapointing. Not only did they get my order wrong by forgeting my garlic bread that made me have to wait an extra ten minutes more to fix this mistake but when I got home I realized that the chicken pizza that I ordered and paid for had NO chicken. Very disapointed!

name: Jennifer Burke
text: Food is great and atmosphere and wait staff are terrific. We love going to this place. The prices are fair and the customer services are amazing.

name: matt carson
text: I did a pickup order for two pizzas recently. The service was fine, but the pizza was awful. I think it was just really really old. Tasted like cardboard with toppings. It's unfortunate because I can recall them having good pizza, but that was a long time ago. I thought I would try them again, but I think that will be the last.

text: I'm extremely fortunate to have this Pizza Hut close to me. I messed up my order using the app. I quickly called the location. John was more than happy and kind enough to correct my mistake and help me out. I will defenitly be ordering from here again in the future.

text: Not even worth one star. 1.5 hours after placing the order, manager asks to pick up the order or wait another 45 mins. He was cursing about his job of how much he hates it and wanted to quit. Never seen such service anywhere. They should shutdown this branch.
